Restaurant Inventory Officer Job at Bukka Hut Restaurant




        
    

        
        Bukka Hut Restaurant is a fast-growing organization with almost 20 outlets in Lagos and care greatly about our staff. Beyond hospitality, Bukka Hut thrives as a people-centric brand with a laser focus on championing people empowerment initiatives. We like to view our business sectors as channels used to transform the lives of our stakeholders. This stems from our internal workforce to the community we operate in.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Inventory Officer

Job Locations: MMA2, Gbagada, Osolo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Maintain accurate inventory records, including detailed information on stock levels, orders, and deliveries.
	Conduct regular inventory audits and physical counts to reconcile inventory data.
	Ensure inventory accuracy through effective cycle counting and adjustment processes.
	Monitor stock levels and ensure that inventory is replenished in a timely manner.
	Coordinate with suppliers and vendors to ensure timely delivery of inventory.
	Generate and analyze inventory-related reports to identify trends, discrepancies, and opportunities for improvement.
	Oversee the store's daily operations, ensuring efficient and organized inventory storage.
	Manage and resolve any discrepancies between physical inventory and inventory records.
	Prepare and submit regular inventory reports to management.
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of inventory transactions.
	Implement and enforce store safety protocols and procedures.
	Identify opportunities to improve inventory management processes and systems.
	Implement best practices for inventory control and management.
	Work with other departments to streamline inventory-related processes.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree with 2 - 3 years of experience.


Salary
N100,000 - N132,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using "Inventory Officer" as the subject of the email.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Internal Auditor",
  "description": "Med-In Pharmaceutical Limited, a producer, manufacturer and seller of intravenous infusion, is&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Auditor
Job Location:&nbsp;Sagamu Interchange, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Develop and implement audit plans and strategies to assess and mitigate risks across the organization.
	Conduct risk assessments and identify areas for improvement in internal controls and processes.
	Oversee the execution of audits, including financial, operational, and compliance audits, to ensure accuracy and effectiveness.
	Review audit findings and recommendations, and collaborate with stakeholders to develop action plans for improvement.
	Stay abreast of regulatory requirements and industry best practices to ensure compliance and adherence to standards.
	Prepare and present audit reports to senior management and MD highlighting key findings and recommendations.
	Foster a culture of accountability, integrity, and continuous improvement within the audit function and across the organization.
	Oversee the debt recovery process by monitoring outstanding invoices, accounts receivable, and payment collections.
	Verify the authorization and legitimacy of requisitions and sales orders

title: Job Openings at Renmoney
content:
Renmoney - We are a passionate team determined to challenge the status quo and make financial inclusion count for the millions of under-banked individuals and small business owners in Nigeria. We provide loans, savings, and fixed deposit solutions to our customers. Our vision is to be the most convenient lending company, delivering outstanding service experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Motion / Video Designer with Ai-Driven Creativity

Job Location: Lagos

The position
     

            
    




	We’re looking for a modern, AI-first Motion/Video Designer to craft compelling visual content that engages our customers, explains our products, and drives performance. This is not a traditional design role - we want someone who’s deeply familiar with generative AI tools, understands what performs in digital channels, and can deliver high-quality videos fast.
	You’ll own video production across ads, explainers, product demos, onboarding journeys, and internal campaigns.
	You’ll work closely with marketing, product, content, and brand teams to tell stories that resonate - while scaling creative output through AI-powered workflows


What you’ll do


	Design and animate short- and long-form video content across paid, owned, and internal channels
	Use GenAI tools (Runway, Pika, Midjourney, Sora, ElevenLabs, etc.) for ideation, scripting, editing, voiceover, and localization
	Develop templates and scalable video systems for rapid content production
	Collaborate with brand, product marketing, and growth teams to align creative with campaign goals
	Produce explainers and visual assets that simplify complex financial concepts and drive customer understanding
	Continuously test and optimize video performance across engagement, CTR, conversion, and retention metrics
	Stay ahead of creative and platform trends across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and beyond


Requirements


	3+ years of hands-on experience in motion design and video content creation
	Proven portfolio of product explainers, social video, ad creatives, and short-form content
	Demonstrated use of AI tools in real-world creative workflows (submit examples with outcomes)
	Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or equivalent
	Deep curiosity and hands-on experience with AI platforms like Runway, ElevenLabs, Midjourney, Pika, Sora, etc.
	Strong storytelling instincts, understanding of animation timing, and sound design
	Experience working cross-functionally with brand, content, and performance teams
	Bonus: 3D animation, scripting, sound editing, or mobile UI animation.


Benefits


	Creative ownership across one of the most strategic marketing channels: motion/video
	Opportunity to build an AI-native design process that defines the future of Renmoney’s brand
	Collaborative, fast-paced team culture with room to experiment and grow
	Access to the latest generative AI tools and workflows
	Competitive salary, benefits, and hybrid working environment.


Click here to apply online

 

2.) Product Marketing Manager

Job Location: Lagos

The position


	We’re looking for a Product Marketing Manager with a strong execution mindset - someone who can lead launches, drive cross-functional GTM plans, and deliver measurable results across all our products and marketing initiatives.
	This is not a traditional PMM role.
	You’ll act as a launch owner and project driver, working across teams to bring products, promos, features, and campaigns to life. Your mission is to turn strategy into action and results.
	You’ll work closely with Product, Growth, Brand, Lifecycle, Content, Analytics and other teams to execute best-in-class go-to-market plans that are fast, focused, and customer-driven.
	This role also expects hands-on usage of AI tools to improve speed, personalization, analysis, and creative execution across all marketing workstreams.


Requirements


	Own and execute GTM strategies for product launches, feature rollouts, special campaigns, and promos
	Translate business and product goals into clear execution plans with defined messaging, audience, and channels
	Coordinate cross-functional stakeholders and lead timelines, approvals, and delivery to launch
	Partner with Brand, Growth, and Lifecycle teams to localize messaging and content across channels
	Develop product positioning and value propositions tailored to customer segments and use cases
	Use AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Midjourney, Notion AI, etc.) to enhance planning, content generation, A/B testing, performance reviews, and creative brainstorming
	Track performance of each launch - define success metrics, analyze results, and optimize future playbooks
	Create and maintain GTM templates, launch dashboards, and feedback loops with product and marketing leads
	Support the CMO with execution of high-priority marketing projects across the business


What you bring:


	4+ years of experience in Product Marketing, GTM strategy, or campaign execution - preferably in fintech, tech, or digital-first industries
	Track record of launching and scaling products or campaigns with measurable results
	Strong project management skills; able to drive execution across multiple teams
	Hands-on experience or clear comfort using AI tools in daily work (e.g., writing briefs, summarizing results, generating creative, automating tasks)


Click here to apply online

 

 

3.) Field Recovery Officer

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client, Renmoney is hiring a Field Recovery Officer to manage and recover overdue accounts through field operations and customer engagement. 
	The role involves executing recovery strategies, negotiating realistic repayment plans,
	Advising on process improvements, all while maintaining regulatory and policy compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Engage defaulting customers and recover overdue debts.
	Negotiate and monitor repayment plans based on financial assessments.
	Update recovery systems and provide insights on debt management strategies.
	Ensure adherence to legal and internal recovery processes.
	Deliver high-quality service in alignment with company values and customer care policies.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in business, finance, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in collections or field recoveries.
	Knowledge of debt recovery principles and legal processes.
	Strong analytical, communication, and negotiation skills.
	Familiarity with call center optimization and financial systems.
	Skip tracing knowledge.


Ideal Candidate:


	Proactive, results-driven, and comfortable with ambiguity.
	A strong communicator and problem-solver.
	Enjoys fast-paced, collaborative environments.


Not Ideal for Those Who:


	Prefer highly structured roles with constant direction.
	Thrive in large, hierarchical teams.
